name: Core Defense (jcmonkey)
description:
Made for ludumdare 47 compo 48hr 

Theme is "Stuck in a Loop"

Made by jcmonkey

Its a simple click and shoot game as long as you can

With the themes restrictions the ship is stuck in an orbital loop

Controls  

  • Press the left mouse button to shoot
  • Aim with the mouse

Applications

  • Engine: Godot
  • Art: Asprite, Gimp
  • Audio: Audacity
  • Music: LMMS
